title: Recipe
description:
A recipe. For dietary restrictions covered by the recipe,
    a few common restrictions are enumerated via suitableForDiet.
    The keywords property can also be used to add more detail.

cookingMethod.title: Cooking Method
cookingMethod.description: The method of cooking, such as Frying, Steaming, ...

recipeCategory.title: Recipe Category
recipeCategory.description: The category of the recipeâ€”for example, appetizer, entree, etc.

recipeCuisine.title: Recipe Cuisine
recipeCuisine.description: The cuisine of the recipe (for example, French or Ethiopian).

recipeIngredient.title: Recipe Ingredient
recipeIngredient.description: A single ingredient used in the recipe, e.g. sugar, flour or garlic. Supersedes ingredients.

recipeInstructions.title: Recipe Instructions
recipeInstructions.description: A step or instruction involved in making the recipe.

recipeYield.title: Recipe Yield
recipeYield.description: The quantity produced by the recipe (for example, number of people served, number of servings, etc).
